channel.title: Char files dont save
channel.description:
Hello, i downloaded a homiescape source. I coded it well, and when i log on and log off it doesnt save the char files (wont send it to Charaters file)
Iv been trying to fix it restlessly. Iv checked the forums but nothing seems to help me.
Can someone tell me how to fix it? so it creates a char files when players log on?

Read full topic

item.title: Char files dont save
item.dc:creator: @zane01 zane01
item.description:
@zane01 wrote:

Im not sure what to do! I downloaded the files and it didnt come with alot of files, so i added them on my own with one of my other sources. So that worked but nothing else did! (It said it couldnt find my CHAR files so i added it, and a moreinfo)

I basicly added all the FOLDERS at the top but like 2

I NEED MASSIVE HELP[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 01, 2009, 05:16:14 pm[/size][hr]OMG I RE-DOWNLOADED AND NOW IT WORKS PERFECTLY! NOW IM GOING TO RE-CODE IT! THANKS TO EVERYONE WHO HELPED, BUT IM FINISHED NOW!

ADMINS OR MODS CLOSE THIS TOPIC PLEASE MY PROBLEM WAS FIXED!
